Created on Nov 5, 2018

@author: Alexandros Stathas

Contains unit tests of ngeoFE applied to Cauchy continua in 1D linear elasticity

1.4.1.2.1.2.1.1.1.2.3. ngeoFE_unittests.Mechanics.Cosserat.OneD.Tests.Cosserat1D_Drucker_Prager_tests_App_2 module¶

Created on Nov 5, 2018

@author: Alexandros Stathas

Contains unit tests of ngeoFE applied to Cauchy continua in 1D linear elasticity

class ngeoFE_unittests.Mechanics.Cosserat.OneD.Tests.Cosserat1D_Drucker_Prager_tests_App_2.Test(methodName='runTest')[source]¶

Bases: TestCase

classmethod setUpClass()[source]¶

Run FE analysis example

test_execution()[source]¶

Tests execution and convergence.

test_localization_width_values()[source]¶

Plots the localization width for the two models of 80 and 160 elements respectively. If the localization width of the two models is close to the analytical value and to each other plot the diagrams.

test_mu_tau_along_height()[source]¶

Plots the results of tau and mu along the height of the layer for the two models of 80 and 160 elements respectively. No test is performed here.

test_shear_force_displacement_values()[source]¶

Tests calculated nodal forces and displacements to values in ./reference_data/Cosserat1D_Drucker_Prager_force_disp_values.out

test_localization_width_values()[source]¶

Plots the localization width for the two models of 80 and 160 elements respectively. If the localization width of the two models is close to the analytical value and to each other plot the diagrams.

Plots the results of tau and mu along the height of the layer for the two models of 80 and 160 elements respectively. No test is performed here.
